data.description:
To fully understand and follow our rules, we have compiled a comprehensive list that covers all essential guidelines for both our server and our game mode. This document serves as a one-stop reference point, making it incredibly convenient for you to access and review everything you need to know while immersed in virtual reality.

We have meticulously detailed each rule to ensure clarity and ease of understanding. Our aim is to create a safe, fair, and enjoyable environment for all players. By adhering to these rules, you contribute to maintaining the integrity and fun of our gaming community. Here's what you can expect from this extensive list:

Server Etiquette and Conduct: This section outlines the expected behavior while interacting with other players on the server. It covers everything from language use and harassment policies to guidelines on how to report misconduct. We emphasize respect, inclusivity, and constructive communication to foster a positive community atmosphere.

Game Mode Specific Rules: These rules are tailored to our unique game mode. They provide detailed instructions on gameplay mechanics, objectives, and restrictions. Understanding these rules is crucial for effective and fair play. We have included tips and examples to help you navigate any complexities and maximize your gaming experience.

errors.message: A server error field_exception occured. Check server logs for details.
